custom_nodes.author: shadowcz007
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-mixlab-nodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: RandomPrompt, TransparentImage, LoadImageFromPath, SplitLongMask

custom_nodes.author: chrisgoringe
custom_nodes.title: Prompt Info
custom_nodes.description: Prompt Info

custom_nodes.author: drustan-hawk
custom_nodes.title: primitive-types
custom_nodes.description: A text-to-speech plugin used under ComfyUI. It utilizes the Microsoft Speech TTS interface to convert text content into MP3 format audio files.

custom_nodes.author: chflame163
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_MSSpeech_TTS
custom_nodes.description: A text-to-speech plugin used under ComfyUI. It utilizes the Microsoft Speech TTS interface to convert text content into MP3 format audio files.

custom_nodes.author: zer0TF
custom_nodes.title: Cute Comfy
custom_nodes.description: Adds a configurable folder watcher that auto-converts Comfy metadata into a Civitai-friendly format for automatic resource tagging when you upload images. Oh, and it makes your UI awesome, too. ðŸ’œ

custom_nodes.author: xXAdonesXx
custom_nodes.title: NodeGPT
custom_nodes.description: Implementation of AutoGen inside ComfyUI. This repository is under development, and not everything is functioning correctly yet.

custom_nodes.author: DigitalIO
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-stable-wildcards
custom_nodes.description: Wildcard implementation that can be reproduced with workflows.

custom_nodes.author: THtianhao
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Portrait-Maker
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:RetainFace, FaceFusion, RatioMerge2Image, MaskMerge2Image, ReplaceBoxImg, ExpandMaskBox, FaceSkin, SkinRetouching, PortraitEnhancement, ...

custom_nodes.author: chibiace
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Chibi-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Loader, Prompts, ...

custom_nodes.author: YMC
custom_nodes.title: ymc-node-suite-comfyui
custom_nodes.description: ymc 's nodes for comfyui. This extension is composed of nodes that provide various utility features such as text, region, and I/O.

custom_nodes.author: spinagon
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-seam-carving
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Image Resize (seam carving). Seam carving (image resize) for ComfyUI. Based on https://github.com/li-plus/seam-carving. With seam carving algorithm, the image could be intelligently resized while keeping the important contents undistorted. The carving process could be further guided, so that an object could be removed from the image without apparent artifacts.

custom_nodes.author: Smuzzies
custom_nodes.title: Chatbox Overlay node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Chatbox Overlay. Custom node for ComfyUI to add a text box over a processed image before save node.

custom_nodes.author: FizzleDorf
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AIT
custom_nodes.description:
A ComfyUI implementation of Facebook Meta's AITemplate repo for faster inference using cpp/cuda. This new repo is behind the old version but is a much more stable foundation to keep AIT online. Please be patient as the repo will eventually include the same features as before.
NOTE: You can find the old AIT extension in the legacy channel.

custom_nodes.author: chrish-slingshot
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ImageGlitcher
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: ImageGlitcher. Based on the HTML image glitcher by Felix Turner here.

custom_nodes.author: whatbirdisthat
custom_nodes.title: cyberdolphin
custom_nodes.description: Cyberdolphin Suite of ComfyUI nodes for wiring up things.

custom_nodes.author: a1lazydog
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-AudioScheduler
custom_nodes.description: Load mp3 files and use the audio nodes to power animations and prompt scheduling. Use with FizzNodes.

custom_nodes.author: storyicon
custom_nodes.title: segment anything
custom_nodes.description: Based on GroundingDino and SAM, use semantic strings to segment any element in an image. The comfyui version of sd-webui-segment-anything.

custom_nodes.author: catscandrive
custom_nodes.title: Image loader with subfolders
custom_nodes.description: Adds an Image Loader node that also shows images in subfolders of the default input directory

custom_nodes.author: laksjdjf
custom_nodes.title: LoRA-Merger-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Load LoRA Weight Only, Load LoRA from Weight, Merge LoRA, Save LoRA. This extension provides nodes for merging LoRA.

custom_nodes.author: avatechai
custom_nodes.title: avatar-graph-comfyui
custom_nodes.description: A custom nodes module for creating real-time interactive avatars powered by blender bpy mesh api + Avatech Shape Flow runtime.

custom_nodes.author: mikkel
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI - Text Overlay Plugin
custom_nodes.description: The ComfyUI Text Overlay Plugin provides functionalities for superimposing text on images. Users can select different font types, set text size, choose color, and adjust the text's position on the image.

custom_nodes.author: SOELexicon
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-LexTools
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI-LexTools is a Python-based image processing and analysis toolkit that uses machine learning models for semantic image segmentation, image scoring, and image captioning.

custom_nodes.author: thedyze
custom_nodes.title: Save Image Extended for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Customize the information saved in file- and folder names. Use the values of sampler parameters as part of file or folder names. Save your positive & negative prompt as entries in a JSON (text) file, in each folder.

custom_nodes.author: hhhzzyang
custom_nodes.title: Comfyui-Lama
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: LamaaModelLoad, LamaApply, YamlConfigLoader. a costumer node is realized to remove anything/inpainting anything from a picture by mask inpainting.

custom_nodes.author: WASasquatch
custom_nodes.title: WAS_Extras
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Conditioning (Blend), Inpainting VAE Encode (WAS), VividSharpen. Experimental nodes, or other random extra helper nodes.

custom_nodes.author: yolanother
custom_nodes.title: Image to Text Node
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Image URL to Text, Image to Text.

custom_nodes.author: yolanother
custom_nodes.title: Comfy UI Online Loaders
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Submit Image (Parameters), Submit Image. A collection of loaders that use a shared common online data source rather than relying on the files to be present locally.

custom_nodes.author: yolanother
custom_nodes.title: Comfy AI DoubTech.ai Image Sumission Node
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyAI submit node to upload images to DoubTech.ai

custom_nodes.author: yolanother
custom_nodes.title: Comfy UI QR Codes
custom_nodes.description: This extension introduces QR code nodes for the Comfy UI stable diffusion client. NOTE: ComfyUI qrcode extension required.

custom_nodes.author: yolanother
custom_nodes.title: Variables for Comfy UI
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: String, Int, Float, Short String, CLIP Text Encode (With Variables), String Format, Short String Format. This extension introduces quality of life improvements by providing variable nodes and shared global variables.

custom_nodes.author: kijai
custom_nodes.title: KJNodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Various quality of life -nodes for ComfyUI, mostly just visual stuff to improve usability.

custom_nodes.author: WASasquatch
custom_nodes.title: ASTERR
custom_nodes.description:
Abstract Syntax Trees Evaluated Restricted Run (ASTERR) is a Python Script executor for ComfyUI.

Warning:ASTERR runs Python Code from a Web Interface! It is highly recommended to run this in a closed-off environment, as it could have potential security risks.

custom_nodes.author: Zuellni
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI PickScore Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Image scoring nodes for ComfyUI using PickScore with a batch of images to predict which ones fit a given prompt the best.

custom_nodes.author: chrisgoringe
custom_nodes.title: Use Everywhere (UE Nodes)
custom_nodes.description: A set of nodes that allow data to be 'broadcast' to some or all unconnected inputs. Greatly reduces link spaghetti.

custom_nodes.author: azazeal04
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Styles
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Anime_Styler, Fantasy_Styler, Gothic_Styler, Line_Art_Styler, Movie_Poster_Styler, Punk_Styler, Travel_Poster_Styler. This extension offers 8 art style nodes, each of which includes approximately 50 individual style variations.

custom_nodes.author: city96
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_ColorMod
custom_nodes.description: This extension currently has two sets of nodes - one set for editing the contrast/color of images and another set for saving images as 16 bit PNG files.

custom_nodes.author: mlinmg
custom_nodes.title: LaMa Preprocessor [WIP]
custom_nodes.description: A LaMa prerocessor for ComfyUI. This preprocessor finally enable users to generate coherent inpaint and outpaint prompt-free. The best results are given on landscapes, not so much in drawings/animation.

custom_nodes.author: alpertunga-bile
custom_nodes.title: prompt-generator
custom_nodes.description: Custom AI prompt generator node for ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: alkemann
custom_nodes.title: alkemann nodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Int to Text, Seed With Text, Save A1 Image.

custom_nodes.author: seanlynch
custom_nodes.title: SRL's nodes
custom_nodes.description:
Nodes: SRL Conditional Interrupt, SRL Format String, SRL Eval, SRL Filter Image List. This is a collection of nodes I find useful. Note that at least one module allows execution of arbitrary code. Do not use any of these nodes on a system that allow untrusted users to control workflows or inputs.

WARNING: The custom nodes in this extension are vulnerable to security risks because they allow the execution of arbitrary code through the workflow

custom_nodes.author: M1kep
custom_nodes.title: Comfy_KepMatteAnything
custom_nodes.description: This extension provides a custom node that allows the use of Matte Anything in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: TGu-97
custom_nodes.title: TGu Utilities
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: MPN Switch, MPN Reroute, PN Switch. This is a set of custom nodes for ComfyUI. Mainly focus on control switches.

custom_nodes.author: M1kep
custom_nodes.title: Comfy_KepKitchenSink
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: KepRotateImage

custom_nodes.author: Kosinkadink
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-VideoHelperSuite
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: VHS_VideoCombine. Nodes related to video workflows

custom_nodes.author: chrisgoringe
custom_nodes.title: Variation seeds
custom_nodes.description: Adds KSampler custom nodes with variation seed and variation strength.

custom_nodes.author: chrisgoringe
custom_nodes.title: Image chooser
custom_nodes.description: A custom node that pauses the flow while you choose which image (or latent) to pass on to the rest of the workflow.

custom_nodes.author: WASasquatch
custom_nodes.title: FreeU_Advanced
custom_nodes.description: This custom node provides advanced settings for FreeU.

custom_nodes.author: Tropfchen
custom_nodes.title: YARS: Yet Another Resolution Selector
custom_nodes.description: A slightly different Resolution Selector node, allowing to freely change base resolution and aspect ratio, with options to maintain the pixel count or use the base resolution as the highest or lowest dimension.

custom_nodes.author: mcmonkeyprojects
custom_nodes.title: Stable Diffusion Dynamic Thresholding (CFG Scale Fix)
custom_nodes.description: Extension for StableSwarmUI, ComfyUI, and AUTOMATIC1111 Stable Diffusion WebUI that enables a way to use higher CFG Scales without color issues. This works by clamping latents between steps.

custom_nodes.author: cubiq
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Essentials
custom_nodes.description: Essential nodes that are weirdly missing from ComfyUI core. With few exceptions they are new features and not commodities. I hope this will be just a temporary repository until the nodes get included into ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: laksjdjf
custom_nodes.title: cd-tuner_negpip-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Apply CDTuner, Apply Negapip. This extension provides the CD(Color/Detail) Tuner and the Negative Prompt in the Promptfeatures.

custom_nodes.author: PTA
custom_nodes.title: auto nodes layout
custom_nodes.description: A ComfyUI extension to apply better nodes layout algorithm to ComfyUI workflow (mostly for visualization purpose)

custom_nodes.author: rklaffehn
custom_nodes.title: rk-comfy-nodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: RK_CivitAIMetaChecker, RK_CivitAIAddHashes.

custom_nodes.author: receyuki
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-prompt-reader-node
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI node version of the SD Prompt Reader.

custom_nodes.author: spacepxl
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-HQ-Image-Save
custom_nodes.description: Add Image Save nodes for TIFF 16 bit and EXR 32 bit formats. Probably only useful if you're applying a LUT or other color corrections, and care about preserving as much color accuracy as possible.

custom_nodes.author: meap158
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Prompt Expansion
custom_nodes.description: Dynamic prompt expansion, powered by GPT-2 locally on your device.

custom_nodes.author: BiffMunky
custom_nodes.title: Endless ️🌊🌠 Node 🌌
custom_nodes.description: A small set of nodes I created for various numerical and text inputs.  Features switches for text and numbers, parameter collection nodes, and two aesthetic scoring models.

custom_nodes.author: chrisgoringe
custom_nodes.title: Variation seeds
custom_nodes.description: Adds KSampler custom nodes with variation seed and variation strength.

custom_nodes.author: spinagon
custom_nodes.title: Seamless tiling Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Node for generating almost seamless textures, based on similar setting from A1111.

custom_nodes.author: ramyma
custom_nodes.title: A8R8 ComfyUI Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Base64Image Input Node, Base64Image Output Node. A8R8 supporting nodes to integrate with ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: Zuellni
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-ExLlama
custom_nodes.description:
Nodes: ExLlama Loader, ExLlama Generator.
Used to load 4-bit GPTQ Llama/2 models. You can find a lot of them over at https://huggingface.co/TheBloke

NOTE: You need to manually install a pip package that suits your system. For example. If your system is 'Python3.10 + Windows + CUDA 11.8' then you need to install 'exllama-0.0.17+cu118-cp310-cp310-win_amd64.whl'. Available package files are here.

custom_nodes.author: budihartono
custom_nodes.title: Otonx's Custom Nodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: OTX Multiple Values, OTX KSampler Feeder. This extension provides custom nodes for ComfyUI created for personal projects. Made available for reference. Nodes may be updated or changed intermittently or not at all. Review & test before use.

custom_nodes.author: bvhari
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_PerpWeight
custom_nodes.description: A novel weighting scheme for token vectors from CLIP. Allows a wider range of values for the weight. Inspired by Perp-Neg.

custom_nodes.author: WASasquatch
custom_nodes.title: Power Noise Suite for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Power Noise Suite contains nodes centered around latent noise input, and diffusion, as well as latent adjustments.

custom_nodes.author: aimingfail
custom_nodes.title: Image2Halftone Node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: This is a node to convert an image into a CMYK Halftone dot image.

custom_nodes.author: M1kep
custom_nodes.title: KepPromptLang
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Build Gif, Special CLIP Loader. It offers various manipulation capabilities for the internal operations of the prompt.

custom_nodes.author: jmkl
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Ricing
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI custom user.css and some script stuff. mainly for web interface.

custom_nodes.author: M1kep
custom_nodes.title: Comfy_KepListStuff
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Range(Step), Range(Num Steps), List Length, Image Overlay, Stack Images, Empty Images, Join Image Lists, Join Float Lists. This extension provides various list manipulation nodes

custom_nodes.author: Clybius
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Latent-Modifiers
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Latent Diffusion Mega Modifier. ComfyUI nodes which modify the latent during the diffusion process. (Sharpness, Tonemap, Rescale, Extra Noise)

custom_nodes.author: ali1234
custom_nodes.title: comfyui-job-iterator
custom_nodes.description:
Implements iteration over sequences within a single workflow run.

NOTE: This node replaces the execution of ComfyUI for iterative processing functionality.

custom_nodes.author: Tropfchen
custom_nodes.title: Embedding Picker
custom_nodes.description: Tired of forgetting and misspelling often weird names of embeddings you use? Or perhaps you use only one, cause you forgot you have tens of them installed?

custom_nodes.author: Kosinkadink
custom_nodes.title: AnimateDiff Evolved
custom_nodes.description:
A forked repository that actively maintains AnimateDiff, created by ArtVentureX.

Improved AnimateDiff integration for ComfyUI, adapts from sd-webui-animatediff.

Download one or more motion models from Original Models | Finetuned Models. See README for additional model links and usage. Put the model weights under ComfyUI/custom_nodes/ComfyUI-AnimateDiff-Evolved/models. You are free to rename the models, but keeping original names will ease use when sharing your workflow.

custom_nodes.author: bvhari
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_PerpNeg [WIP]
custom_nodes.description:
Nodes: KSampler (Advanced + Perp-Neg). Implementation of Perp-Neg
Includes Tonemap and CFG Rescale optionsComfyUI custom node to convert latent to RGB.

WARNING: Experimental code, might have incompatibilities and edge cases.

custom_nodes.author: hayden-fr
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Model-Manager
custom_nodes.description: Manage models: browsing, donwload and delete.

custom_nodes.author: wolfden
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUi_String_Function_Tree
custom_nodes.description: This custom node provides the capability to manipulate multiple string inputs.

custom_nodes.author: city96
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_DiT [WIP]
custom_nodes.description:
Testbed for DiT(Scalable Diffusion Models with Transformers).

None of this code is stable, expect breaking changes if for some reason you want to use this.

custom_nodes.author: braintacles
custom_nodes.title: braintacles-nodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: CLIPTextEncodeSDXL-Multi-IO, CLIPTextEncodeSDXL-Pipe, Empty Latent Image from Aspect-Ratio, Random Find and Replace.

custom_nodes.author: mav-rik
custom_nodes.title: Facerestore CF (Code Former)
custom_nodes.description:
This is a copy of facerestore custom node with a bit of a change to support CodeFormer Fidelity parameter. These ComfyUI nodes can be used to restore faces in images similar to the face restore option in AUTOMATIC1111 webui.
NOTE: To use this node, you need to download the face restoration model and face detection model from the 'Install models' menu.

custom_nodes.author: ArtBot2023
custom_nodes.title: Character Face Swap
custom_nodes.description: Character face swap with LoRA and embeddings.

custom_nodes.author: cubiq
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_IPAdapter_plus
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI reference implementation for IPAdapter models. The code is mostly taken from the original IPAdapter repository and laksjdjf's implementation, all credit goes to them. I just made the extension closer to ComfyUI philosophy.

custom_nodes.author: ealkanat
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Easy Padding
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI Easy Padding is a simple custom ComfyUI node that helps you to add padding to images on ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: seanlynch
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Optical Flow
custom_nodes.description: This package contains three nodes to help you compute optical flow between pairs of images, usually adjacent frames in a video, visualize the flow, and apply the flow to another image of the same dimensions. Most of the code is from Deforum, so this is released under the same license (MIT).

custom_nodes.author: bmad4ever
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Bmad-Custom-Nodes
custom_nodes.description: This custom node offers the following functionalities: API support for setting up API requests, computer vision primarily for masking purposes using GrabCut or contours, and general utility to streamline workflow setup or implement essential missing features.

custom_nodes.author: RockOfFire
custom_nodes.title: CR Animation Nodes
custom_nodes.description: A comprehensive suite of nodes to enhance your animations. These nodes include some features similar to Deforum, and also some new ideas.

custom_nodes.author: Dr.Lt.Data
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Inspire Pack
custom_nodes.description: This extension provides various nodes to support Lora Block Weight and the Impact Pack.

custom_nodes.author: wolfden
custom_nodes.title: SDXL Prompt Styler (customized version by wolfden)
custom_nodes.description: These custom nodes provide a variety of customized prompt stylers based on twri/SDXL Prompt Styler.

custom_nodes.author: Dream Project
custom_nodes.title: Dream Project Animation Nodes
custom_nodes.description: This extension offers various nodes that are useful for Deforum-like animations in ComfyUI.

custom_nodes.author: comfyanonymous
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI_experiments
custom_nodes.description:
Nodes: ModelSamplerTonemapNoiseTest, ReferenceOnlySimple, RescaleClassifierFreeGuidanceTest, ModelMergeBlockNumber, ModelMergeSDXL, ModelMergeSDXLTransformers, ModelMergeSDXLDetailedTransformers.

This is a consolidation of the previously separate custom nodes. Please delete the sampler_tonemap.py, sampler_rescalecfg.py, advanced_model_merging.py, sdxl_model_merging.py, and reference_only.py files installed in custom_nodes before.

custom_nodes.author: ssitu
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI fabric
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes based on the paper 'FABRIC: Personalizing Diffusion Models with Iterative Feedback' (Feedback via Attention-Based Reference Image Conditioning)

custom_nodes.author: picturesonpictures
custom_nodes.title: comfy_PoP
custom_nodes.description: A collection of custom nodes for ComfyUI. Includes a quick canny edge detection node with unconventional settings, simple LoRA stack nodes for workflow efficiency, and a customizable aspect ratio node.

custom_nodes.author: Acly
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Nodes for External Tooling
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Load Image (Base64), Load Mask (Base64), Send Image (WebSocket), Crop Image, Apply Mask to Image. Provides nodes geared towards using ComfyUI as a backend for external tools.

custom_nodes.author: ntdviet
custom_nodes.title: ntdviet/comfyui-ext
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:LatentGarbageCollector. This ComfyUI custom node flushes the GPU cache and empty cuda interprocess memory. It's helpfull for low memory environment such as the free Google Colab, especially when the workflow VAE decode latents of the size above 1500x1500.

custom_nodes.author: laksjdjf
custom_nodes.title: attention-couple-ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:Attention couple. This is a custom node that manipulates region-specific prompts. While vanilla ComfyUI employs an area specification method based on latent couples, this node divides regions using attention layers within UNet.

custom_nodes.author: spro
custom_nodes.title: Latent Mirror node for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: Latent Mirror. Node to mirror a latent along the Y (vertical / left to right) or X (horizontal / top to bottom) axis.

custom_nodes.author: WASasquatch
custom_nodes.title: PPF_Noise_ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: WAS_PFN_Latent. Perlin Power Fractal Noisey Latents

custom_nodes.author: Ttl
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Neural network latent upscale custom node
custom_nodes.description: A custom ComfyUI node designed for rapid latent upscaling using a compact neural network, eliminating the need for VAE-based decoding and encoding.

custom_nodes.author: GeLi1989
custom_nodes.title: roop nodes for ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: ComfyUI nodes for the roop A1111 webui script.

custom_nodes.author: Onierous
custom_nodes.title: QRNG_Node_ComfyUI
custom_nodes.description: Nodes: QRNG Node CSV. A node that takes in an array of random numbers from the ANU QRNG API and stores them locally for generating quantum random number noise_seeds in ComfyUI

custom_nodes.author: Lerc
custom_nodes.title: Canvas Tab
custom_nodes.description: This extension provides a full page image editor with mask support. There are two nodes, one to receive images from the editor and one to send images to the editor.

custom_nodes.author: YOUR-WORST-TACO
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-TacoNodes
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:TacoLatent, TacoAnimatedLoader, TacoImg2ImgAnimatedLoader, TacoGifMaker.

custom_nodes.author: skfoo
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI-Coziness
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:MultiLora Loader, Lora Text Extractor. Provides a node for assisting in loading loras through text.

custom_nodes.author: Fannovel16
custom_nodes.title: ComfyUI Loopchain
custom_nodes.description: A collection of nodes which can be useful for animation in ComfyUI. The main focus of this extension is implementing a mechanism called loopchain. A loopchain in this case is the chain of nodes only executed repeatly in the workflow. If a node chain contains a loop node from this extension, it will become a loop chain.

custom_nodes.author: Sxela
custom_nodes.title: ComfyWarp
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:LoadFrameSequence, LoadFrame

custom_nodes.author: Beinsezii
custom_nodes.title: bsz-cui-extras
custom_nodes.description:
This extension consists of auxiliary nodes for automatic calculation of latent sizes, an all-in-one node for SDXL's t2i, i2i, and scaling/hiresfix, and nodes capable of loading the Pixelbuster library.

NOTE:Currently, the Pixelbuster library includes libraries for Windows and Linux environments by default. For other environments such as OSX, you will need to build and use Pixelbuster directly from here.

custom_nodes.author: richinsley
custom_nodes.title: Comfy-LFO
custom_nodes.description: Nodes:LFO_Triangle, LFO_Sine, SawtoothNode, SquareNode, PulseNode. ComfyUI custom nodes to create Low Frequency Oscillators.
